setcpm(180/4)

$: s("saxello_vib? | saxello | organ_full")
  .n(rand.range(-10, 20))
  .scale("E#1: major")
  .sustain(rand.range(0.1, 1))
  .release(rand.range(0.2, 2))
  .room(3)
  .delay(.2)
  .gain(.3)
  .lpf(slider(2900, 0, 4000))
  .dist(.1)
  .fast(8)
  .degradeBy(.4)
  .rib(40, 32)
  .pianoroll()

_$: s("supersaw | supersaw*2? _ _")
  .note("<27 30 31 30 _ _>")
  .lpf(4000)
  .delay(.3)
  .fm(4)
  .fast(8)
  .gain(rand.range(.6, .7))
  .lpa(slider(4.295,0,5))
  .lpe(slider(0.25,0,10))
  .lpq(slider(2.385,0,15))
  ._pianoroll()


$: s("sine").gain(.5)

$: s("hh:7!8")
  .gain(rand.range(0.1, 0.25))
  .fast(2)
  .room(.2)
  .rib(3, 4)
  ._punchcard()
$: s("sbd").beat("0, 4.9", 8)._punchcard()
$: s("sd:2").beat("1, 3", 4).gain(.2)._punchcard()
_$: s("snare_rim").beat("1, 3, 5", 4).gain(rand.range(.2, .4)).fast(2)
  ._punchcard()

setcpm(180/4)
samples('github:switchangel/breaks')

$: s("saxello_vib? | saxello | organ_full")
  .n(rand.range(-10, 10))
  .scale("E#1: major")
  .sustain(rand.range(0.1, 1))
  .release(rand.range(0.2, 2))
  .room(3)
  .delay(.2)
  .gain(.3)
  .lpf(slider(2900, 0, 4000))
  .dist(.1)
  .fast(8)
  .degradeBy(.4)
  .rib(96, 32)
  .pianoroll()

_$: s("<supersaw> | <supersaw*2?>")
  .n("<1 2 3 4>").scale("E#1: major")
  .trans(12)
  .lpf(2000)
  .delay(.2)
  .fm(2)
  .room(.4).roomfade(1)
  .fast(8)
  .gain(rand.range(.6, .7))
  .lpa(slider(3.875,0,5))
  .lpe(slider(1.09,0,10))
  .lpq(slider(4.875,0,15))
  ._pianoroll()


$: s("hh:7!8")
  .gain(rand.range(0.1, 0.25))
  .fast(2)
  .room(.2)
  .rib(3, 4)
  ._punchcard()
  $: s("sbd").beat("0, 4.9", 8)._punchcard()

  ._punchcard()

await samples('github:yaxu/clean-breaks/main');
await samples('github:yaxu/spicule/master');
await samples('github:switchangel/breaks');

$: s("apache/2").fit()
  .scrub("<0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7>*8 | <0 1 2 3 1 2 3 7>*8".div(16)

  .almostNever(ply("2 | 3"))
  .lpf(3000)
  .rib(13, 32)
  ._punchcard()

$: s("think").fit()

$: s("sbd").beat("0, 5", 8)
  ._scope()
$: s("xx").slow(2).delay(.2).room(.2).roomsize(10).dist(2)

//@title Breakbeat1 @by weekendwarrior

setcpm(180/4)

await samples('github:yaxu/clean-breaks/main');
await samples('github:yaxu/spicule/master');
await samples('github:switchangel/breaks');


_$: s("apache/2")
  .fit()
  .scrub("<0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7>*8 | <0 1 2 3 1 2 3 7>*8".div(16)
         .velocity(rand.range(.7, 1)))
  .almostNever(ply("2 | 3"))
  .lpf(3500)
  .dec(.2)
  .rib(13, 64)

$: s("think").fit().gain(.6)
  //.scrub("<7 7 2 3 3 3 6 7>*8".div(8))
  .scrub(irand(8).div(8)).struct("x [x x] x x x x [x x] x")
  .almostNever(ply(2))
  .dec(rand.range(0.1, 0.2))
  .rib("<113!4 70!8>", 8)
  .lpf(4000)
  .lpe(10)
  .lpq(2)
  .hpf(900)
  .color("brown")
  .punchcard()



$: s("sine").n("<2@2 1 0>")
  .scale("F: minor")
  .trans(-24)
  .gain(.3)
  .release(1)
  ._scope()


$: s("the_wire:1").chop(8).scrub("<1 2 3 4>")
  

$: s("ravebass").n("<4 0 2 0>").scale("A: major: pentatonic").trans(-12)
  .gain(.03)
  .fast(1)
  .delay(.2)
  .jux(rev)
  //.dec(.1)
  //.lpf(1000)
  ._pianoroll()


$: stack(
    s("sbd").beat("0, <1 ~ <3.5 4.5> ~>, 5", 8).gain(.4).dec(.3).color("red"),
    s("sd:1").beat("2, 6", 8).gain(.3).dec(.1).color("black"),
    s("hh:8").euclid(8, 8).almostNever(ply(2)).gain(rand.range(0.2, .3))
  )
  ._punchcard()

_$: s("bsvocals").n(rand.range(0, 13))
  .end(rand.range(0.2, 1))
  .lpf(2000)
  .hpf(100)
  .delay(.2)
  .room(.2).roomsize(2)
  .gain(.05)
  .degradeBy(.4)
  .rib(42, 32)
  ._pianoroll()

EqiokBqo8k1m.code:
setcpm(150/4)

await samples('github:yaxu/clean-breaks/main')

_$: s("supersaw")
  .gain(.5)
  .fast(8)
  .lpf(slider(1412, 0, 4000)) //low-pass filter
  .lpa(slider(2.04, 0, 5)) //attack duration for the filter envelope
  .lpe(slider(2.23, 0, 10)) //filter envelope
  .lpq(slider(2.52, 0, 15)) //resonance
  .note("<2@6 4 1> * 2".almostNever(trans("16 | 12")))
  .almostNever(trans("4 | 9")) //transposes notes ~10% of the time
  .scale("C#: minor")
  .delay(rand.range(0.5, 1.5))
  .room(.1).roomsize(1) //reverb
  .fm(rand.range(.3, .7))
  .release(.1)
  .velocity(rand.range(.7, 1))
  .rib(8, 32) //controls randomness
  .pianoroll()

$: s("saw").gain(.3).n(seq("<1 2 1 4>*1.5"))
  .fast(16)._pianoroll()


let drums = stack(
    s("sbd").euclid("<4!15 <4 2>>", 8).slow(1).dist(0).color("pink"), //sub kick
    s("hh:2").euclid(10, 32).slow(2).velocity(rand.range(.4, .6)).degradeBy(.01).color("white"), //hit-hat
    s("jazz:4").beat(0, 4).slow("<2 1.5>").velocity(rand.range(.1, .2)).gain(.8).color("blue") //snare
  )
  ._scope()

$: drums

_$: s("sd:2").beat(2, 4).fast(4).velocity(rand.range(.05, .1))

sVSFASEDLpU_.code:
setcpm(150/4)

//await samples('github:yaxu/clean-breaks/main')

const sc = "E#: minor"

$: s("supersaw")
  .gain(.5)
  .fast(8)
  .lpf(slider(0, 0, 4000)) //low-pass filter
  .lpa(slider(4.545, 0, 5)) //attack duration for the filter envelope
  .lpe(slider(3.09, 0, 10)) //filter envelope
  .lpq(slider(4.875, 0, 15)) //resonance
  .note("<2@6 4 1> * 2"
        .almostNever(trans("16 | 12 "))
        .rib(16, 32)) //controls randomness
  .almostNever(trans("4 | 9")) //transposes notes 10% of the time
  .scale(sc)
  .sometimesBy(.05, ply(2))
  .delay(rand.range(0.5, 1.5))
  .room(.1).roomsize(1) //reverb
  .fm(rand.range(.3, .7))
  .release(.1)
  .velocity(rand.range(.7, 1))
  .orbit(2)
  ._pianoroll()

$: s("sine").n("<2 0, -8>").scale(sc)
  .trans(-24)
  .gain(.4)
  .slow(4)
  .sustain(2)
  .release(1)
  .attack(.4)
  .fm(1)
  .room(1)
  ._pianoroll({labels: 1})
$: s("brown").room(1).delay(.2).gain(.2).lpf(2000)

_$: s("crackle:1")
_$: s("the_wire:1")
  .slow(8)
  .gain(.4)
  .lpf(2000)
  .delay(.2)
  ._spectrum()


let drums = stack(
    //s("sbd").euclid("<4!15 <4 2>>", 8).slow(1).color("pink"), //sub kick
    s("hh:3").euclid("11 | 19 | 20", 32) //hit-hat
      .slow(2)
      .velocity(rand.range(.2, .3))
      .degradeBy(.01)
      //.hush()
      .color("white"),
    s("bd:4").beat("0, <~ 14>", 16).slow(2).velocity(rand.range(.1, .2)) //snare
  )

$: drums.scope()

const bass_gain = slider(0.591, 0, 1)

const drums_gain = slider(0.218, 0, 1)

$: s("supersaw")
  .gain(lead_gain)
  .fast(8)
  .lpf(slider(168, 0, 4000)) //low-pass filter
  .lpa(slider(0, 0, 5)) //attack duration for the filter envelope
  .lpe(slider(1.42, 0, 10)) //filter envelope
  .lpq(slider(0, 0, 15)) //resonance
  .note("<2@6 4 1> * 2"
        .almostNever(trans("16 | 12 "))

  .almostNever(trans("4 | 9")) //transposes notes 10% of the time

  .sometimesBy(.05, ply(2))
  .delay(rand.range(0.5, 1.5))
  .room(.1).roomsize(1) //reverb
  .fm(rand.range(.3, .7))
  .release(.1)
  .velocity(rand.range(.7, 1))
  .orbit(2)
  .pianoroll()

  .fast(2)

  .scale(sc)
  .trans(12)
  .att(4)
  .release(4)
  .room(4).roomsize(4)
  .delay(2)
  //.fm(1)

  ._pianoroll()

  .gain(bass_gain)
  .slow(4)
  .sustain(2)
  .release(2)
  .attack("<.3 .2>")
  .degradeBy(0.01)
  .fm(1)
  .room(1)
  ._pianoroll({labels: 1})

_$: s("crackle:1")
$: s("the_wire:1")
  .slow(8)
  .gain(.3)
  .lpf(2000)
  .delay(.4)
  ._spectrum()

    s("sbd").euclid("<4!15 <4 2>>", 8).slow(1).color("pink"), //sub kick
    s("hh:3").euclid("11 | 19 | 20", 32) //hit-hat
      .slow(2)

      .degradeBy(.01)
      //.hush()
      .color("white"),
    s("bd:4").beat("0, <~ 14>", 16).slow(2).velocity(rand.range(.4, .5)) //snare
  )

$: drums.gain(drums_gain).lpf(drums_lpf)._scope()

6rEsEau0oCBz.code:
setcpm(150/4)

//await samples('github:yaxu/clean-breaks/main')

const gp = gamepad()

const sc = "F: minor"

const lead_gain = slider(0.231, 0, 1)
const bass_gain = slider(0.441, 0, 1)
const pad_gain = slider(0.0894, 0, .2)
const drums_gain = slider(0.501, 0, 1)

const drums_lpf = slider(7000, 0, 7000)

LEAD: s("supersaw")
  .gain(lead_gain)
  .fast(8)
  .lpf(slider(2036, 0, 4000)) //low-pass filter
  .lpa(slider(2.045, 0, 5)) //attack duration for the filter envelope
  .lpe(slider(2.75, 0, 10)) //filter envelope
  .lpq(slider(1, 0, 15)) //resonance
  .note("<2@6 4 1> * 2"
        .almostNever(trans("16 | 12 "))
        .rib(16, 32)) //controls randomness
  .almostNever(trans("4 | 9")) //transposes notes 10% of the time
  .scale(sc)
  .sometimesBy(.05, ply(2))
  .delay(rand.range(0.5, 1.5))
  .room(.1).roomsize(1) //reverb
  .fm(rand.range(.3, .7))
  .release(.1)
  .velocity(rand.range(.7, 1))
  .mask(gp.tglB)
  .pianoroll()

PAD: s("saxello_vib")
  .gain(pad_gain)
  .fast(2)
  .note("<2@6 4 1> * 2")
  .scale(sc)
  .trans(12)
  .att(4)
  .release(4)
  .room(4).roomsize(4)
  .delay(2)
  //.fm(1)
  //.hpf(500)
  .mask(gp.tglY)
  ._pianoroll()
  

BASS: s("sine").n("<2 0, -8>").scale(sc)
  .trans(-24)
  .gain(bass_gain)
  .slow(4)
  .sustain(2)
  .release(2)
  .attack("<.3 .2>")
  .degradeBy(0.01)
  .fm(1)
  .room(1)
  .mask(gp.tglX)
  ._punchcard({labels: 1})
NOISE: s("brown").room(1).delay(.2).gain(.2).lpf(2000)

VOCALS: s("the_wire:1")
  .slow(32)
  .gain(.3)
  .lpf(1500)
  .hpf(1000)
  .delay(.2).delayfb(.2)
  //.mask(gp.LT)
  ._spectrum()


DRUMS: stack(
    s("sbd").euclid("<4!15 <4 2>>", 8).slow(1).mask(gp.tglA), //sub kick
    s("hh:3").euclid("11 | 19 | 20", 32) //hit-hat
      .slow(2)
      .velocity(rand.range(.2, .3))
      .degradeBy(.01)
      .mask(gp.tglRB)
      .color("white"),
    s("bd:4").beat("0, <~ 14>", 16).slow(2).velocity(rand.range(.4, .5)) //snare
  )
  .gain(drums_gain)
  .lpf(drums_lpf)

rkurFOr2iCen.code:
//@title Look Out For Me @by weekendwarrior
let ccn = await midin('LoopBe Internal MIDI')

setcpm(150/4)

//await samples('github:yaxu/clean-breaks/main')

const gp = gamepad()

const sc = "F: minor"

const lead_gain = slider(0.174, 0, 1)
const bass_gain = slider(0.441, 0, 1)
const pad_gain = slider(0, 0, .2)
const drums_gain = slider(0.301, 0, 1)

const drums_lpf = slider(4018, 0, 7000)

LEAD: s("supersaw")
  .gain(lead_gain)
  .fast(8)
  .lpf(ccn(20).range(0, 4000)) //low-pass filter
  .lpa(ccn(21).range(0, 5)) //attack duration for the filter envelope
  .lpe(ccn(22).range(0, 10)) //filter envelope
  .lpq(ccn(23).range(0, 15)) //resonance
  .note("<2@6 4 1> * 2"
        .almostNever(trans("16 | 12 "))
        .rib(16, 32)) //controls randomness
  .almostNever(trans("4 | 9")) //transposes notes 10% of the time
  .scale(sc)
  .sometimesBy(.05, ply(2))
  .delay(rand.range(0.5, 1.5))
  //.room(.1).roomsize(1) //reverb
  .fm(rand.range(.3, .7))
  .release(.1)
  .velocity(rand.range(.7, 1))
  //.mask(gp.tglB)
  .pianoroll()

PAD: s("saxello_vib")
  .gain(pad_gain)
  .fast(2)
  .note("<2@6 4 1> * 2")
  .scale(sc)
  .trans(12)
  .att(4)
  .release(4)
  .room(4).roomsize(4)
  .delay(2)
  //.fm(1)
  //.hpf(500)
  //.mask(gp.tglY)
  ._pianoroll()
  

BASS: s("sine").n("<2 0, -8>").scale(sc)
  .trans(-12)
  .gain(bass_gain)
  .slow(4)
  .sustain(2)
  .release(2)
  .attack("<.3 .2>")
  .degradeBy(0.01)
  .fm(1)
  .room(1)
  //mask(gp.tglX)
  ._punchcard({labels: 1})
NOISE: s("brown").room(1).delay(.2).gain(.2).lpf(2000)

VOCALS: s("the_wire:1")
  .slow(32)
  .gain(.3)
  .lpf(1500)
  .hpf(1000)
  .delay(.2).delayfb(.2)
  //.mask(gp.LT)
  ._spectrum()


DRUMS: stack(
    s("sbd").euclid("<4!15 <4 2>>", 8).slow(1)
      //.mask(gp.tglA)
    , //sub kick
    s("hh:3").euclid("11 | 19 | 20", 32) //hit-hat
      .slow(2)
      .velocity(rand.range(.2, .3))
      .degradeBy(.01)
      //.mask(gp.tglRB)
      .color("white"),
    s("bd:4").beat("0, <~ 14>", 16).slow(2).velocity(rand.range(.4, .5)) //snare
  )
  .gain(drums_gain)
  .lpf(drums_lpf)

await samples('github:yaxu/clean-breaks/main');
await samples('github:yaxu/spicule/master');
await samples('github:switchangel/breaks');

  .fit()
  .gain(.4)
  .scrub("<0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7>*8 | <0 1 2 3 1 2 3 7>*8".div(16)
         .velocity(rand.range(.7, 1)))
  .almostNever(ply("2 | 3"))
  .lpf(3500)
  .dec(.2)
  .rib(13, 64)


_$: s("think").fit().gain(.6)
  //.scrub("<7 7 2 3 3 3 6 7>*8".div(8))
  .scrub(irand(8).div(8)).struct("x [x x] x x x x [x x] x")
  .almostNever(ply(2))
  .dec(rand.range(0.1, 0.2))

  .lpf(3500)

  .hpf(900)

  ._punchcard()



$: s("supersaw").n("<2@2 1 0>")
  .scale("F: minor")
  .trans(-24)
  .gain(.4)
  .release(.5)
  .lpf(200)
  .lpe(2)
  .lpa(0.1)
  ._scope()


$: s("penguins").n("<1 ~ 1 0>").note("F2")
  .dec("<10 0 2.5 10 .5 0 3 10>").gain(.4).delay(1).slow(4)
  
 

$: stack(
    s("sbd").beat("0, <1 ~ <3.5 4.5> ~>, 5", 8).gain(.4).dec(.3).color("red"),
    s("sd:1").beat("2, 6", 8).gain(.3).dec(.1).color("black"),
    s("hh:8").euclid(8, 8).almostNever(ply(2)).gain(rand.range(0.2, .3))
  )
  ._punchcard()

$: s("bsvocals").n(rand.range(0, 13))
  .lpf(2000)
  .hpf(100)
  .delay(.2)
  .room(.2).roomsize(2)
  .gain(.03)
  .jux(rev)
  .degradeBy(.4)

  ._pianoroll()

7xJaEkKFgHEg.code:
//@title Look Out For Me @by weekendwarrior
let ccn = await midin('LoopBe Internal MIDI')

setcpm(150/4)

//await samples('github:yaxu/clean-breaks/main')

const gp = gamepad()

const sc = "A#: minor"

const lead_gain = slider(0.174, 0, 1)
const bass_gain = slider(0.441, 0, 1)
const pad_gain = slider(0.0528, 0, .2)
const drums_gain = slider(0.301, 0, 1)

const drums_lpf = slider(6468, 0, 7000)

LEAD: s("supersaw")
  .gain(lead_gain)
  .fast(8)
  .lpf(ccn(20).range(0, 4000)) //low-pass filter
  .lpa(ccn(21).range(0, 5)) //attack duration for the filter envelope
  .lpe(ccn(22).range(0, 10)) //filter envelope
  .lpq(ccn(23).range(0, 15)) //resonance
  .note("<2@6 4 1> * 2"
        .almostNever(trans("16 | 12 "))
        .rib(16, 32)) //controls randomness
  .almostNever(trans("4 | 9")) //transposes notes 10% of the time
  .scale(sc)
  .sometimesBy(.05, ply(2))
  .delay(rand.range(0.5, 1.5))
  //.room(.1).roomsize(1) //reverb
  .fm(rand.range(.3, .7))
  .release(.1)
  .velocity(rand.range(.7, 1))
  .mask(gp.tglB)
  .pianoroll()

PAD: s("saxello_vib")
  .gain(pad_gain)
  .fast(2)
  .note("<2@6 4 1> * 2")
  .scale(sc)
  .trans(12)
  .att(4)
  .release(4)
  .room(4).roomsize(4)
  .delay(2)
  //.fm(1)
  //.hpf(500)
  .mask(gp.tglY)
  ._pianoroll()
  

BASS: s("sine").n("<2 0, -8>").scale(sc)
  .trans(-12)
  .gain(bass_gain)
  .slow(4)
  .sustain(2)
  .release(2)
  .attack("<.3 .2>")
  .degradeBy(0.01)
  .fm(1)
  .room(1)
  .mask(gp.tglX)
  ._punchcard({labels: 1})
NOISE: s("brown").room(1).delay(.2).gain(.2).lpf(2000)

VOCALS: s("the_wire:1")
  .slow(32)
  .gain(.3)
  .lpf(1500)
  .hpf(1000)
  .delay(.2).delayfb(.2)
  //.mask(gp.LT)
  ._spectrum()


DRUMS: stack(
    s("sbd").euclid("<4!15 <4 2>>", 8).slow(1)
      .mask(gp.tglA)
    , //sub kick
    s("hh:3").euclid("11 | 19 | 20", 32) //hit-hat
      .slow(2)
      .velocity(rand.range(.2, .3))
      .degradeBy(.01)
      .mask(gp.tglRB)
      .color("white"),
    s("bd:4").beat("0, <~ 14>", 16).slow(2).velocity(rand.range(.4, .5)) //snare
  )
  .gain(drums_gain)
  .lpf(drums_lpf)

rZ4BaKmmnn9j.code:
//@title  @by weekendwarrior

setcpm(180/4)

await samples('github:yaxu/clean-breaks/main');
await samples('github:yaxu/spicule/master');

const drums = stack(
    s("sbd").beat("0, <1 ~ <3.5 4.5> ~>, 5", 8).gain(.4).dec(.3),
    s("sd:1").beat("2, 6", 8).gain(.3).dec(.1),
    s("hh:8!8").almostNever(ply(2)).gain(rand.range(0.2, .3))
  )

const breakbeat = s("think").fit()
  .gain(.6)
  .scrub(irand(8).div(8))
  .struct("x [x x] x x x x [x x] x")
  .almostNever(ply(2))
  .dec(rand.range(0.1, 0.2))
  .rib("<113!4 70!8>", 8)
  .lpf(3500)
  .hpf(900)

const bass = s("supersaw")
  .n("<2@2 1 0>")
  .scale("F: minor")
  .trans(-24)
  .gain(.4)
  .release(.5)
  .lpf(200)
  .lpe(2)
  .lpa(0.1)

_$: s("saw, sawtooth").dec(.1).delay(.2).jux(rev)
  .n("<2@16 1@8 0@8>".almostNever(trans())).fast(8)
  .degradeBy(.5)
  .scale("F4: minor")
  .postgain(.1)

const pad = s("synths/4").note("C0").fit().gain(.3).lpf(1000)

const main_vocals = s("penguins:1@2 penguins:0")
  .note("D2")
  .beat("0, 8, <~ 14.1>", 16)
  .dec("10 2.3 10")
  .pan(irand(1))
  .slow(16)
  .delay(.5)
  .cutoff(perlin.range(2000, 8000))
  .gain(.8)

const ambient_vocals = s("penguins").n("<0 1 1 0>")
  .begin("<.67 .71@2 <.67 .2>>"
         .sometimes(mul(rand.range(.1, 1))))
  .dec("<.7@2 .3@2>")
  .delay(.4)
  .pan(sine.range(0, 1).slow(3))
  .echo(4, 1/4, .2)
  .almostNever(ply(2))
  .note(rand.range(36, 49))
  .fast(2)
  .postgain(.45)

const ambient_vocals2 = s("bsvocals")
  .n(rand.range(0, 13))
  .lpf(2000)
  .hpf(100)
  .delay(.2)
  .room(.2).roomsize(2)
  .gain(.02)
  .jux(rev)
  .degradeBy(.4)
  .rib(216, 64)

$: stack(
  bass.color("black"),
  breakbeat.lpf(slider(3500, 0, 3500)).color("blue"),
  drums.lpf(slider(8000, 0, 8000)),
  main_vocals.color("purple"),
  //ambient_vocals.color("red"),
  ambient_vocals2,
  pad
).punchcard()

$: s("penguins").n("<0 1 1 0>").begin("<.67 .71@2 <.67 .2>>".sometimes(mul(rand.range(.1, 1)))).dec("<.7@2 .3@2>")
  .delay(.4)
  .pan(sine.range(0, 1).slow(3))
  .echo(4, 1/4, .2)
  .almostNever(ply(2))
  //.note(rand.range(36, 49))
  .fast(2)
  .postgain(.6)

$: s("sine").n("<0@3 ~ 3@2>").scale("E#: minor").dec(.2).lpf(900).fast(8).postgain(.7)

_$: note("[0, 2, 4]").scale("<A B E A>: major")
  .s("supersaw").fast(1)
  .gain(.4)
  .delay(.9)
  .dec(.4)
  .lpf(1000).hpf(900)
  .scope()
  ._pianoroll({labels: 1})
$: s("sbd [~ bd:9] sd:2 ~").gain(.5).lpf(3000)._punchcard()

$: s("hh:1!8").gain(sine.range(.2, .4)).almostNever(ply("2 | 4?"))._punchcard()
